articles.description: Despite my best efforts, it’s getting very hard to ignore the fact that something is going on between Kendall Jenner and Bad Bunny. Please, avert your eyes for these photos of them (probably) kissing while leaving a sushi restaurant in L.A.

articles.title: Topol, star of "Fiddler on the Roof" and "Flash Gordon," RIP - Boing Boing
articles.description: Topol—the mononymous Israeli actor who played Tevye in “Fiddler on the Roof” (1971), Dr. Hans Zarkov in “Flash Gordon” (1980), and countless other roles—has died at age 87. …

articles.author: Carly Johnson
articles.title: Queer Eye star Tom Jackson passes away age 63 following cancer battle - Daily Mail
articles.description: Queer Eye star Tom Jackson has died at age 63 following a battle with metastatic adenocarcinoma, which is a gland cancer that has spread to other areas of the body.
articles.content:
